pitt.search.semanticvectors

Class VectorSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitt.search.semanticvectors.VectorSearcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VectorSearcher.AnalogySearcher, VectorSearcher.BalancedVectorSearcherPerm, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherBoundMinimum, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherBoundProduct, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherBoundProductSubSpace, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherCosine, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherIntersection, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherLucene, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherMaxSim, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherMinSim, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherPerm, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherPlain, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherProximity, VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherSubspaceSim

    public abstract class VectorSearcher
extends Object
    Class for searching vector stores using different scoring functions. Each VectorSearcher implements a particular scoring function which is normally query dependent, so each query needs its own VectorSearcher.

      Class for searching a vector store using the bound product of a series two vectors.

      Class for searching a vector store using the bound product of a series two vectors.

      Class for searching a vector store using the bound product of a series two vectors.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherCosine
      Class for searching a vector store using cosine similarity.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherIntersection
      Class for searching a vector store using the intersection of a set of two vectors - binary vectors only currently.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherLucene
      Class for implementing Lucene search directly (no semantic vectors required)
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherMaxSim
      Class for searching a vector store using minimum distance similarity.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherMinSim
      Class for searching a vector store using minimum distance similarity (i.e.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherPerm
      Class for searching a permuted vector store using cosine similarity.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherPlain
      Class that searches based on cosine similarity with given queryvector.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherProximity
      Class that searches based on proximity between terms.
      static class  VectorSearcher.VectorSearcherSubspaceSim
      Class for searching a vector store using quantum disjunction similarity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VectorSearcher

        public VectorSearcher(VectorStore queryVecStore,
                      VectorStore searchVecStore,
                      LuceneUtils luceneUtils,
                      FlagConfig flagConfig)
        Performs basic initialization; subclasses should normally call super() to use this.
        Parameters:
        queryVecStore - Vector store to use for query generation.
        searchVecStore - The vector store to search.
        luceneUtils - LuceneUtils object to use for query weighting. (May be null.)
        flagConfig - Flag configuration (cannot be null).

    • Method Detail

      • expandSearchSpace

        public static VectorStore expandSearchSpace(VectorStore searchVecStore,
                                            FlagConfig flagConfig)
        Expand search space for dual-predicate searches

      • getScore

        public abstract double getScore(Vector testVector)
        This needs to be filled in for each subclass. It takes an individual vector and assigns it a relevance score for this VectorSearcher.

      • getNearestNeighbors

        public LinkedList<SearchResult> getNearestNeighbors(int numResults)
        This nearest neighbor search is implemented in the abstract VectorSearcher class itself: this enables all subclasses to reuse the search whatever scoring method they implement. Since query expressions are built into the VectorSearcher, getNearestNeighbors no longer takes a query vector as an argument.
        Parameters:
        numResults - the number of results / length of the result list.

      • getAllAboveThreshold

        public LinkedList<SearchResult> getAllAboveThreshold(float threshold)
        This search is implemented in the abstract VectorSearcher class itself: this enables all subclasses to reuse the search whatever scoring method they implement. Since query expressions are built into the VectorSearcher, getAllAboveThreshold does not takes a query vector as an argument. This will retrieve all the results above the threshold score passed as a parameter. It is more computationally convenient than getNearestNeighbor when large numbers of results are anticipated
        Parameters:
        threshold - minimum score required to get into results list.

      • transformToStats

        public LinkedList<SearchResult> transformToStats(LinkedList<SearchResult> rawResults,
                                                 int count,
                                                 double sum,
                                                 double sumsq)
        calculates approximation of standard deviation (using a somewhat imprecise single-pass algorithm) and recasts top scores as number of standard deviations from the mean (for a single search)
        Returns:
        list of results with scores as number of standard deviations from mean
